segments.text: Oh , my god ! I look so old . I look as if I were 40 . I think it's time for some plastic surgeries . I'm tired of these wrinkles and sagging skin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't see any wrinkles or sagging skin ! You'd better stop being so ridiculous .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anyway I think I need a nose job and some breast implants as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you need to get a brain surgery . Honestly speaking , you look charming .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know what you mean . I just want to make myself more attractive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are fine the way you are . Besides , plastic surgery hurts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure it is . So you'd better get rid of this idea .
segments.speaker: S2
